    • Class gameObjects.Barrier

      class Barrier extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • edge1
          Edge edge1
          First edge of the barrier.
        • edge2
          Edge edge2
          Second edge of the barrier.
        • placedBy

          Player who placed the barrier.

    • Class gameObjects.Board

      class Board extends EdgeWeightedGraph implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • barriers
          List<Barrier> barriers
          List of barriers placed on the board.

    • Class gameObjects.Game

      class Game extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • board
          Board board
          Board of the game.
        • players
          List<Player> players
          List of players. The length of the list is either 2 or 4, because there can only be 2 or 4 players.
        • turnCount
          int turnCount
          Turns' counter. It increments by 1 everytime a player does something.

    • Class gameObjects.Player

      class Player extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • color
          Color color
          Color of the player The color representing the player
        • name
          String name
          Name of the player Its name will be displayed throughout the game
        • position
          Position position
          Position of the player Its location on the game board

  • Package graph

    • Class graph.Edge

      class Edge extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • source
          Position source
          Source of the edge.
        • target
          Position target
          Target of the edge.
        • weight
          int weight
          Weight of the edge.

    • Class graph.EdgeWeightedGraph

      class EdgeWeightedGraph extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • adjacencyList
          LinkedList<Edge>[] adjacencyList
          Adjacency list of the graph.
        • size
          int size
          Size of the graph. The size represents the number of rows/columns of the board. So there are size*size nodes in the graph.
